--- title: "GTGameEngine Third-Party Libraries" layout: default ---

Third-Party Libraries

A special thankyou must go out to the awesome third-party libraries used by GTGameEngine.

If you're building GTGameEngine from source, you'll need to build most of these libraries. Some of these are included in the the main code-base. Refer to the GitHub project page for information on building GTGameEngine from source.

{% include thirdparty-table.html %}
